definition: residence/(coll.) to stay in at home/to hang around at home

sentences.english: Are you more of a 4)homebody than a party girl?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲自己是一個宅女，還是一個派對女郎？

sentences.english: Major while is in family belongs ' curtilage female ' .
sentences.chinese: 大部分時間在家當‘宅女’。

sentences.english: Until the Mid-Autumn day, my senior house woman finally go out.
sentences.chinese: 直到中秋節那天，我這個資深宅女終於出門了。

definition: die-hard otaku (sb who hardly ever emerges from their home, where they play games, watch movies etc)
a guy who stays at home all the time, typically spending a lot of time playing online games (derived from Japanese "otaku")
single girl who is not interested in relationships, living a lackadaisical life (loanword from Japanese "himono onna")
fujoshi (woman who likes mangas about male homosexual love)
otaku, a Japanese term for people with obsessive interests such as anime, manga, and video games/see also 宅男[zhai2 nan2]/see also 宅女[zhai2 nu:3]
"leftover woman" (successful career woman who has remained single)
fig. unmarried person/single person (especially one who is comfortable financially)
(coll.) outwardly cold or retiring but deep and passionate inside
